name: Waterloo, Belgium

verified_details.detail_0: Site of the Battle of Waterloo on 18 June 1815

significance: The location of Napoleon's final defeat, marking the end of his rule and the Napoleonic Wars.

name: Ligny, Belgium

verified_details.detail_0: Site of the Battle of Ligny on 16 June 1815

significance: The site of Napoleon's last victory, setting the stage for the Battle of Waterloo.

name: Quatre Bras, Belgium

verified_details.detail_0: Site of the Battle of Quatre Bras on 16 June 1815

significance: A key battle that prevented French forces from consolidating, affecting the outcome at Waterloo.
